医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示光激活巨噬细胞如何增加对癌细胞的食欲身体有一支名副其实的军队，时刻保持警惕，保护我们免受从感染到癌症等微小威胁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Study-reveals-how-light-activated-macrophages-increase-their-appetite-for-cancer-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Study-reveals-how-light-activated-macrophages-increase-their-appetite-for-cancer-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d8ea897-ae6d-44f3-b064-ff7f86403a91 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 13:36:00 -0400 Study reveals how light-activated macrophages increase their appetite for cancer cells
研究人员发现了大脑中存储和使用视觉知识的机制我们的大脑通过将我们所看到的与我们已知的相结合来解释视觉信息。 Champalimaud 基金会的研究人员在《Neuron》杂志上发表的一项研究，并得到了 Caixa 基金会 CaixaResearch Health Call 的支持，揭示了一种学习和存储有关世界的现有知识的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Researchers-uncover-mechanism-for-storing-and-using-visual-knowledge-in-the-brain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Researchers-uncover-mechanism-for-storing-and-using-visual-knowledge-in-the-brain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ac13b7b-4c8b-4a50-8ad2-cba9980b29b5 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 13:19:52 -0400 Researchers uncover mechanism for storing and using visual knowledge in the brain
含有 IL-21 的工程 NK 细胞对胶质母细胞瘤表现出强大的抗肿瘤活性根据德克萨斯大学 MD 安德森癌症中心的最新研究，经过改造后表达白细胞介素 21 (IL-21) 的自然杀伤 (NK) 细胞在体外和体内均表现出对胶质母细胞瘤干细胞样细胞 (GSC) 的持续抗肿瘤活性中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Engineered-NK-cells-with-IL-21-show-strong-antitumor-activity-against-glioblastoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Engineered-NK-cells-with-IL-21-show-strong-antitumor-activity-against-glioblastoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49e00097-e1c4-4789-ab16-9680b4ef9185 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 13:15:47 -0400 Engineered NK cells with IL-21 show strong antitumor activity against glioblastoma
研究表明，全面的心理健康保险法可改善儿童获得护理的机会加州大学旧金山分校领导的一项针对近 30,000 名美国护理人员的研究表明，当各州要求保险公司承保心理和行为健康时，儿童可以获得更好的护理服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Compressive-mental-health-coverage-laws-improve-childrens-access-to-care-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Compressive-mental-health-coverage-laws-improve-childrens-access-to-care-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0ee714c-2f86-413b-99aa-551ea542210e Mon, 12 Aug 2024 13:09:51 -0400 Comprehensive mental health coverage laws improve children's access to care, study reveals
研究人员呼吁医疗保险涵盖高危老年人的驾驶安全评估2020 年，约 4800 万持照驾驶员年龄超过 65 岁。在这个年龄段，车祸导致 7,480 人死亡和 149,881 人非致命伤害。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Researchers-call-for-Medicare-to-cover-driven-safety-evaluations-of-at-risk-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Researchers-call-for-Medicare-to-cover-driven-safety-evaluations-of-at-risk-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b27f2496-77f1-4cde-9b53-2db799b0fb28 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 13:04:27 -0400 Researchers call for Medicare to cover driving safety evaluations of at-risk, older adults
研究人员借助锡的帮助，利用透明蠕虫确定了多巴胺信号传导中的关键遗传因素......多巴胺是一种强大的大脑化学物质和神经递质，是许多重要功能的关键调节剂，例如注意力、体验快乐和奖励以及协调运动。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Researchers-identify-key-genic-players-in-dopamine-signaling-using-transparent-worms-With-The-Help-Of-A-Tin。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Researchers-identify-key-genic-players-in-dopamine-signaling-using-transparent-worms-With-The-Help-Of-A-Tin。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2609c959-8b53-4746-b8bd-06f52934b711 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 12:46:20 -0400 Researchers identify key genetic players in dopamine signaling using transparent worms With The Help Of A Tin...
新组蛋白标签的发现为神经退行性疾病的髓磷脂修复带来了希望在一项开创性的研究中，纽约市立大学研究生中心高级科学研究中心 (CUNY ASRC) 的研究人员在成体少突胶质细胞祖细胞 (OPC) 中发现了一个独特的组蛋白标签，这可能为针对髓磷脂修复（关键目标）的创新疗法铺平道路。用于治疗多种神经退行性疾病和精神疾病，包括多发性硬化症、阿尔茨海默病和精神分裂症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-histone-tag-discovery-offers-hope-for-myelin-repair-in-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/New-histone-tag-discovery-offers-hope-for-myelin-repair-in-neurodogenic-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c8251ed-dbd9-481a-8a51-91e67e865b50 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 12:33:23 -0400 New histone tag discovery offers hope for myelin repair in neurodegenerative diseases
研究揭示神经元同步和意识体验几十年来，科学家们一直关注大脑如何以分层方式处理信息，不同的大脑区域专门负责不同的任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Study-sheds-light-on-neuronal-synchronization-and-cious-experience.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Study-sheds-light-on-neuronal-synchronization-and-cious-experience.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2df62419-1043-4726-b749-f522f9866a93 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 12:27:32 -0400 Study sheds light on neuronal synchronization and conscious experience
简化测试可有效预测癌症患者的吸烟成瘾来自近 6000 名患有癌症的吸烟者的数据表明，预测谁会戒烟可能比之前想象的更容易。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Simplified-test- effective-in-predicting-smoking-addiction-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Simplified-test- effective-in-predicting-smoking-addiction-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99d8be89-c999-4944-8550-447b8be27f35 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 12:19:17 -0400 Simplified test effective in predicting smoking addiction in cancer patients
研究表明父母的饮食习惯直接影响孩子的饮食行为阿斯顿大学的研究表明，幼儿经常表现出与父母相似的饮食行为，父母自己的饮食方式会影响他们喂养孩子的方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Research-shows-parents-eating-habits-directly-influence-childrens-eating-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240812/Research-shows-parents-eating-habits-directly-influence-childrens-eating-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1113478-ab41-4f67-af95-2b57edfb6459 Mon, 12 Aug 2024 12:12:52 -0400 Research shows parents' eating habits directly influence children's eating behavior
